content.detailedDescription: Hello again. the object observed this evening was a large bright orb off in the distance. my friend( who will remain annonymous at this time) and i decided to drive toward it. the whole while driving toward this round gold colored object it remained stationary as if observing something until we got up to it. once we reached the object it began to slowly move away. at this time we noticed that there was a small amount of flashing behind the object. i have a small amount of video footage to put toward the sighting. once the object went across the road it was no longer an orb. it was a very large multicolored craft with absolutely no sound what so ever. it flashed in a strobe like fashion. the colors seen were red, white, blue, and green. l.E.D like.  very beautiful. i knew exactly what the object was when i went toward it. considering it was absent of sound. as low to the ground as it was i would expect to hear an awful lot of engine noise or helicopter noise but with this object there was nothing except a wonderful sight to see.
content.summary: Closer each time

content.detailedDescription: So my roommate and i were walking home from our friend's apartment, we had just started to watch a movie, the vanishing, with jeff bridges. it is a remake of a film from 1988, it was released in 1992 i think, it was remade by the same director. some people say that this version of the movie lacks the dark and cynical punch of the original, but we find that this one has an unintended comedic effect. jeff bridges' dialect in the movie is like a cross between doctor evil from the austin powers movies and, well, you get the idea. so we get a case of beer and some olde english 40s and have some drinks when watching the movie. and it is a stereotypical 90s thriller movie. we even made a drinking game for it, where if you can correctly predict a movie cliche that is coming up, everyone drinks, but if you get it wrong, you drink twice. like in one scene, (spoiler alert), jeff bridges is in kiefer sutherland's apartment to kidnap and kill his girlfriend, and i correctly predicted that his girlfriend would sense that someone was in the apartment, but would not be able to find him. so everyone drank. so i went out to my car to get my laptop just before the movie started, because i had a paper due the next day. we paused the movie, so we were only like 3 minutes in, and when i was out by the car, i heard this strange whirring noise coming from over the trees. i know that some people might think that they could mistake this for like, another car, a groundskeeping machine, or a heater or something. well i know all of the sounds in that neighborhood, and it was not any of them. but i wasn't really that interested in it because i was really into this movie, because it was crappy movie night. (explained earlier in the encounter) thinking nothing of the noise, i went back inside with my laptop, charged it, put some popcorn in the microwave, and sat down to have a drink. our friends were drinking light beer, and we were drinking malt liquor, because we feel like it is a better deal than the 12 pack of beer, though the 12 pack of beer is a little more convenient in case you do not want to drink it all, because, you know, then you don't have to open the whole thing and have it go to waste if you can't finish it. but we were reasonably confident that we would be able to finish it, because it was just one bottle of malt liquor. just then, we heard some banging noises coming from the other room, and it was echoing throughout the house. my friend got really freaked out by it, but i knew that it was just the popcorn. (he's a really jumpy person.) so we get back into watching the movie, and i'm eating cookie cake because my birthday was a few days earlier and my mom sent me a cookie cake. which, i know you're thinking, "hey, you're in college, why is your mom sending you a cookie cake?" well it was a nice gesture on her part, and my friends and i enjoyed it over a beer. it was actually a decent cookie cake too, it was reasonably thick, and was fresh. it was easily the best cookie cake i had ever eaten. just then, about half an hour into the movie, there was a knock at the door, and the guy delivering the wings came and delivered the wings. while i was at the door, there were bright red lights coming from over the trees. they seemed to be in a distinctive pattern, but i was mainly focused on the wings, so i ignored them. and we went back to see the vanishing, and at the end of the movie, jeff bridges tells kiefer sutherland that he has to drink some drugged coffee to see what happened to his old girlfriend. he says, "drink this," and at that point, every time he says that, we were supposed to drink. i won't ruin the ending of the movie for you, but our friend matt was reasonably drunk. he had opened a bunch of beers, and then went for his first bottle of malt liquor, which is weird because he's kind of described himself as a connoisseur of beer, wine, and spirits. but whatever. after the movie was over, people were passed out on the ground, and others were going to a bar. the whole place was a mess. i started to clean up, and i opened the blinds of the window, and i saw a chevron shaped object hovering over the soccer fields next to my friends apartment. then i came up with this plan where we would pretend that the vanishing had disappeared in the mail, so we could keep it, and not send it back to netflix. so we'll see how that plan works out. but it was definitely chevron shaped.
content.summary: Chevron shaped object seen overhead

content.detailedDescription:
I *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) was told lookup when my son was screaming look look,we all saw a spactcular sight of at last 30 star like dot's moving like allthe stars were moving south west ,then i noticed they started to grather in a v shape and  moved out at a rate of speed faster than light
and disaperd the dot's steched into oval's in this v formation two more group's of 30 or more  followed , and exited a few degree's more to the south .The v formation 's was aprox 100,000 feet up and five miles across.Clear sky's , it lasted 45seconds ,a few seconds later i called 911 to report and was refered to the f.A.A. after that i went to a friend's house that work's at n.A.S.A. and told that person what just happened and that person said they saw the samething 40 years ago back east.Three of us saw this great event. when i saw this at first i could not belive what i was seeing and then i knew what it was and thought we could be in trouble this was the real starwar's 
**(wit's initials deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Looking up in the sky noticed aprox 30 in the first group, two more group's

content.detailedDescription:
i���m a retired engineer with degrees in broadcast engineering and commercial aviation.  i���ve held a pilots license since 1973.  in addition, during my career i have had extensive experience working with nasa.
 
06:15 sept 29,2010

i saw a very bright light in the direction from which the sun would rise.  06:15 am on sept 29 is 45 mins before sunrise.  the predawn sky at that point was just starting to show the faintest hint of light.  
 
my first thought was that the iss was in line with the sun and i was seeing reflection from it.  however the light was traveling from northeast to southwest, opposite of the iss orbit.  

then as the object moved out of alignment with the sun���s angle, the light abruptly went out.  what the hell, i thought.  it didn���t make sense.  at that point the terminator between night and day was still in the atlanta area and if something was high enough to reflect the sun��� 

a. the reflection would be constant, and 
b. the object would have to be at orbital altitudes.   i was puzzled.      the quick math did not add up.
 
as my eyes followed the path that the light had taken, i saw it.  no if ands or buts.  i saw it and it was real.
 
it was a huge and i mean huge.  
 
again, as i followed the path of the light, (after it went out) i saw a huge crescent shaped object flying very high.   it was metallic in color, and the edges were rounded.  it appeared to be much higher than the 767 i had just seen.  it was blocking out stars as it passed overhead.  the hint of light defined the front edge very plainly.  the rear edge appeared to be a crescent shape as well.  and lo and behold, a second one was flying right behind it.
 
ok, now determining altitude is often difficult.  what lead me to believe that this was higher, much higher than the airline was the ���softness��� of the image due to pre-dawn humidity which on a clear day indicates very high altitude.  i could see the distinct outline of the earlier 767 and the humidity softness wasn���t apparent at 30,000 or so feet. the object was definitely was not lower than the airliner.
 
each object was approximately 15 to 20 degrees arc in width.  at 45000 feet, it would make it approximately the width of an aircraft carrier or greater. they had to be several hundred feet at the minimum and 1/8-1/4 mile wide at the most.  the speed appeared to be greater than 600-700mph.
no noise, no sonic boom.
 
i viewed the objects for a minute or so before they traveled out of sight.
one last thing, and i think it���s very important.   i always thought that if i were every lucky enough to see a ufo that i would be elated with joy because the question would be settled in my mind.
 
as i watched these objects an extreme feeling of dread fell over me.  my thoughts were, ���this is not good.  this is bad, very bad.���   
 
it was overpowering and for several days i wrestled with two things.  the first being that my understanding of the world changed drastically during that one minute or so.   the second was that ���this is definitely not good!���   as if something sinister was at work.   
 
as an experienced pilot and engineer i know for a fact that i did not see a stealth, an aurora, a ���wave rider��� hypersonic aircraft, the supposed triangle lighter than air craft, or any super military advanced technology.
content.summary: Observed two large crescent shaped craft flying overhead

content.detailedDescription:
As my son and i were sitting in the living room watching television i began to hear a quiet rumbling. it sounded as if someone was pulling up to our home. as i listened the rumbling became increasingly louder, as if i were at an airshow and their was a low flying aircraft sporting its after burners. i proceeded to run outside and look up into the sky. what i saw were two lights over a ridge that is not far from my home. they had the appearance of being stars but in that position in the sky there are typically no stars.

being as it was cold, i went inside and continued to look at the lights through my living room window. as i watched closer it appeared that the lights were moving slowly, one following the other. just when i noticed that they were indeed moving the front one disappeared followed quickly by the second. at this point the rumbling noise had decreased quite significantly. as soon as i saw them disappear i ran back outside and looked toward where the lights had been. as i was staring i saw, what appeared to be extremley close, a "shooting star" which followed the path of the lights.

after seeing this i did not quite know how to react. it was neat to see it but at the same time i want some answers as to what it was.
content.summary: Two lights above a ridge and a "shooting star" following quickly behind them.

content.detailedDescription: as i have sent photo's of i believe are (objects in our sky?)i believe some of the ufo's have the ability to be invisiable to the naked i and camera,well some what with the camera.I went through some of my photo's snd hsve found many images that are amazeing,but unknown.Please fill free to keep an open mind and understand there is something going on in our clouds and sky then we know.Nasa knows what is about to come.I have been exploreing our skys for sometime and if i know,so do they.In the first photo's im about to send,look toward the bottom right corner.There is a disc shaped image of a object that as the ability(invisable)
content.summary: You must stand back from photo(look)

content.detailedDescription: This happens every night in the same spot. sometimes there are up to 10 near eachother, sometimes their are only 3. they are big spheres that are extremely bright and rather rainbow colored but if not an orange-ish glow. the location closest to where they fly over every night is in crete il (america) and there is a road called old post road by plum valley subdivision. you will see them around there. there is also haunted woods off of old post road (axemans bridge), im not sure if there is any connection. i was in my room looking out my window last night, and i saw 3 of them last night. they flew a variation of fast and slow but they stayed in the same area almost the whole night. i wasnt any sort of emotion, this happens every night and i just decided to report it.
content.summary: 3 big spheres of rainbow light circle eachother in same spot for hour or so

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke and was facing the eastern sky.  i saw what i though to be a shooting star, yellowish in color.  it seemed faster than a normal shooting star.  as it streaked down at an angle...Suddenly as it hit an approximate altitude...Instead of the normal burnout disappearance, the speed slowed to half and it suddenly moved horizonally until i could no longer see it due to structures in my view.  no way that was a shooting star.  no way it was any known aircraft!  the speed and change in direction were extremely apparent.  i was excited and my heart was racing the instant it's speed and direction were noted.  i ran inside to tell others what i had just seen.
content.summary: Not a shooting star!

content.detailedDescription: I see sometimes a blue looking beam come out of some of them.I have found some of them to use a stream,like a time warp of some sort.I'm not out to joke about any of this,i believe they are watching us,changeing our weather in some sort.I have been through a camera,which worked great for alittle while then something happened to it,my cell phone also took the blunge.Somebody needs to see what i have.I believe my photo's can help us understand what is going on,and warn us.
content.summary: They have been changeing our weather,hanging mainly around our sun.

content.detailedDescription: Sighted an object at about 35 degrees elevation, above the constellation scorpio.  the object appeared in the east and moved to the ene.  lost to sight at about 20 elevation after about 20 seconds.  very faint, white and star-like, and moving very fast.  no anti-collision or strobe lights observed, and no sound.  no other aircraft observed at the time of the sighting.
content.summary: Sighted an object at about 35 degrees elevation, above the constellation scorpio.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: i'm an amature photographer.I love captureing images out of our skys.I have found more in our skys then just clouds.Go to *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg)i have posted some of them.(clouds)"images in our skys".Since may 5th,2010,i have been captureing images out of our skys,and they are only getting stronger.My photo's can and will proof we are not alone.                                                                                                                                                     these objects i know are ufo"s.I believe they have been messing with our weather(clouds)our clouds know there there,why do i say this,well if you check out my work(images in our skys)you will not believe your eye's.Magical.As i have tried to tell some of the news,they laugh it off.These objects glide through our skys and interupt our clouds.I see blue beams comeing out of them,i have witness so much in our skys these last 8 months.I just hope we all will be ok.I believe they are spying on us.Here is some of them.I have to many to post,most see.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: They have been in our skys alot lately.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was delivering newspapers on a back road near the town of reedsville at about 2 a.M.  i was speaking to my sister who was in another part of the county also delivering. i approached a 4 way intersection that is in the middle of some large fields(farms).  i saw a light at the horizon that was too big to be a star and was smaller than the moon(3/4 or so tonight)and besides, the moon was behind me.  

i told my sister that i thought, at first, that it was an aircraft and that it was going to crash or land in one of the fields(northeast of the intersection) and as the object got within about 200 yards of me it stopped midair and appeared to grow or glow brighter. it made absolutely no noise.   i became alarmed as a broad beam of light shone toward me.  i made the right hand turn at the intersection(normal direction of my paper route)and as i drove along the field, the object followed along side my car at roughly 200yards.  it was approximately 75 yards high and the light was making a sweeping motion back and forth (from the front of my vehicle to the rear).  

at this point i was quite alarmed and drove into a snow bank as i couldnt bring myself to take my eyes off of it.  i managed to pull out of the snow bank and came to the end of the field.  at this point the object was slightly behind me.  i stopped the car and watched as the object rapidly headed off to the northwest and over the treeline. 

i was in the military for several years in air defense and i can say without a doubt that this was no aircraft i've ever seen.  as the object turned and the light quit shining on me, i could see that the object looked disc-shaped with a domed top and what i can only describe as fins on the back with red lights along them.  they were not visible as it approached me.  the fins were large and if you picture the craft on your logo above with 2 large, rounded fins on the right hand side(think tailfins on an old car), that is the view i had as it left.  

i was quite frightened and my sister was panicked on the phone because the whole time the object was near me i was describing it and apparently i was quite loud.  she said after it was over she believed me because she could hear the panic and fear in my voice. it took a while to calm down and as soon as i was done with my route, i decided to report the incident to your websight.  as i write this, i feel anxious and still have that surreal feeling.  i figured if anyone was going to believe me, it would be you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object approached me rapidly then followed along side as i turned at an intersection

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i had just stepped out for a smoke and were chatting and leaning on a car. as we stared into the sky it was cloudless and we were both immediately drawn to one star. 30 seconds after we looked up i asked him "you looking at that one?" and pointed it out. he replied "yah its crazy looking" as we both watched, transfixed, it appeared to turn red, then green, and shades of blue, while also pulsating light, like a star, but much more mechanical looking. i then asked "now tell the truth, does it look like its figure eighting?"  all he could say was "holy ****. i was gonna ask the same thing but thought i was crazy." at about the 15 minute mark it got very, very bright, almost as if it was a far, far, away sun. we stared for about half an hour before it seemed to dim out. we seemed to forget about it, but now every time i run into him its all we talk about. also their are many many fields near by.
content.summary: Star like ufo began to flash different colors and figure eight

content.detailedDescription:
Starting about a month ago, i became aware of these strange glowing lights in the sky when i looked out the second story window of my house in bartlett, illinois. living here for 19 years, and knowing that o'hare airport is in that direction, i thought nothing of it. i thought they were probably just planes or helicopters. it was strange, as i had not seen anything like this before, though. that's what stuck out at me. these objects stayed in one relative spot. they moved, but not erratically. just slightly around each other. i noticed they would stay in patterns. either these objects would form a triangular configuration, or take a linear configuration. i thought this was something pretty strange if they were conventional aircraft. i also noticed that they don't blink. they glow, and slightly flicker. these objects would appear out of nowhere starting around 6 pm cst, and they would stay for hours, usually ending around 9 pm cst. i have never seen these objects during the day. on february 14, 2010, i decided to try to record them (for a second time), as they appeared at dusk instead of the usual night time, and it would be easier for my camera to capture them. after recording the video, i uploaded it to my computer. i took a screenshot of a scene in the video, put it into photoshop, and used the "emboss" effect to see exactly what shape these objects took. what i saw really surprised me. they were showing up as spheres. six of them, in a triangular pattern with three smaller ones in the middle. when my sightings first started, there were only 3 of these lights visible. as time has progressed, these sightings have become more and more frequent, with more objects. now almost nightly, i can see at least 5 of them, and usually no more than 8. as i have stated, these objects will stay for hours on end. i have watched these objects closely hoping to catch them doing some crazy ufo-like behavior, like zooming back up into space, but all they do is kind of "fade out," and i lose sight of them. this does not happen every night, but close to it now. seeing these objects make me more confused than anything. if they are planes, how are they visible for so long? why don't the lights get bigger as they get closer, or smaller as they get farther? if they are helicopters, why do they glow instead of blink or flash? why do they show up in the exact same spot so frequently, and hover for so long? why don't i ever see them move anywhere, except around each other in a relative manner? i will attach the original screen shot taken from my video, the embossed version of the screen shot, and the video itself so you can decide. you can also check out the link at the end of this to see my discussion with other people, who have confirmed the lights are not a radio tower or something of the like. what they are remains a mystery to me.

*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Objects suddenly appear out of seemingly no where. stay in one relative place for hours on end with little movement, before eventually fading away.

content.detailedDescription: At first i was not going to file a report because i have no idea what it was i saw, then i recognized the irony of that, so here goes. i was dropping my dog off at the kennel a little after 3:00 pm. i had gotten out of my car and just happened to look up. the sky was mostly clear with a few patches of cirrus type clouds. the object was in a clear area of the sky but close enough to a bank of clouds to tell that it was at a lower altitude. the object looked like a bright white dash (just like this: - ) with slightly rounded ends. it was so bright it almost appeared to be glowing. from my perspective, it would have been a little less than 1/2 an inch long. there was no contrail, no sound, no wings, tail or markings. it was not moving quickly, so i watched, trying to figure out what it might be. after a minute or two, it simply faded out of sight. it did not move behind clouds, or leave my field of vision, it faded out. i instantly recalled an incident from the summer of 1978 when i saw exactly the same thing. i was laying in the grass staring up at the sky. oddly enough it would have been around 3:00 pm then as well. i saw a bright white cigar shaped object moving through a perfectly blue, cloudless sky. it would have been very close to the same size and shape and moving at roughly the same rate of speed. i watched it cross the sky until it went behind some hills and out of my field of vision. i had the same thoughts as a girl that i had this time, just trying to figure out what i was looking at, curious and a little bewildered. i assumed it was probably a plane. i am assuming there is a man-made answer this time as well. i have seen some pictures on this site that resemble what i saw. (sorry, no pics--i didn't have a camera at hand.) you guys are the experts, and i am sure that if it is something normal you have already seen it enough times to have figured that out. i would appreciate you letting me know. feel free to contact me via e-mail as i am harder to catch by phone. and my heartfelt thanks for the work you do!
content.summary: Bright white cigar shaped object moving steadily across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I have 12 foot windows that face west and have a expansive view of the sky. i was sitting down to watch tv, facing the windows when an object with lights travelled from overhead, west away from my point of view. it travelled to the hill opposite, moved 20-30 feet to the right, hovered and then slowly landed as if it were a helicopter. 

as it's very dark out tonight, i only saw lights, not an actual object. i saw three white lights in a triangle pattern, the apex heading away from me. i'd say the object was small, perhaps about the size of a car. in the center of the object was a blinking red light. entire sighting lasted 20-30 seconds. 

i noticed it because there is no flight path here. the only times we have planes in this area is when the blue angels are practicing for sea fair. 

i thought i was seeing a plane and the lights were on it's landing gear. so, i watched it to see if i could verifiy that it was indeed a plane. that's when it reached the opposite hill, moved right, and then hovered, before landing. 

there is no helipad where it landed and it did not have lights like helicopters do. additionally, it was silent. if it were a helicopter, i would have heard it. 

in reading other reports here, it does seem like there have been two other cases of a black triangle object with lights in a similar pattern to what i saw. i'm reporting this in case others may have seen something that can't be explained.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: West seattle - triangle of 3 white lights and 1 blinking red

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine and i had stayed out late (until about 4am) messing around with some walkie-talkies that i had. i was about 13 at the time, but i still remember exacly what i saw.
i can't give the exact time or date, but i estimate that it would have been in the summer sometime because we were on break from school. as for the time i saw the craft, it was around 2 or 3am (sometime well after midnight). 
i was looking directly up at the sky from an empty lot next door to my house. i remember looking at a cluster of dim stars until something caught my eye. one dim yellow/white light (that i thought was a satellite) moved very slowly into the cluster of stars directly above me. 
in an instant it seemed like the entire thing "uncloaked" and became this massive black isocelese triangle shape with one light in each corner. it was a lot bigger than a commercial airplane. the lights were dim, yellow/white. it was considerably low in the sky and it blocked out the view of the stars above it. it was almost completely silent; there was only a quiet rumble or hum coming from it. it was moving slow, traveling north towards imlay city road. (eventually it could have gone over bowers road. etc.)
right when i noticed it, i yelled out to my friend who was only a few feet behind me, telling her to look at it. she confirmed what i was looking at, but we had no idea what it was. it gave me and odd, almost unsettling feeling.
i lost sight of it about 30 seconds to a minute after i initially saw it. it didn't disappear, it just continued to fly north until i was unable to see it.
we didn't have any way to record it or take photos, but i can provide a visual of what it looked like.
content.summary: Massive black triangle with 3 lights resembling stars. low in the sky, traveled slow.

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were out snowmobiling and noticed a strange pattern of orange lights in a giant v shape off in the distance thinking they were just 12 aircraft in a hold pattern for ohare intl airport we drove up to a large hill and turned off the snowmobile to watch the lights. after sitting there for over 30 minutes the lights never moved from their location only their pattern changed. from a single row of lights in a v shape to a double row of lights that would split off from the original v. this is hard to explain but then the highest light/object in the v shape pattern would start to rotate in a spiral clockwise pattern about 30 rpm then stop and become a single light in the sky.They are still visable in the sky and have been now for almost an hour. i am going to feel realy stupid if this turns out to be a hot air ballon event but i'm pretty sure they don't keep their burners on for an hour straight! gonna head out now with the old sony video cam with super night shot and see if that will pick up the lights. the flip video cam and my g1 cell can't even see the stars out tonight.  wish me luck, if i can get them on video i'll follow up.

wish me luck!
content.summary: Long string of orange lights in a v pattern

content.detailedDescription: Today my fiance said check out how much they're spraying us! this is amazing....The most and closest chemtrails i've seen. i have more photos and longer videos. i clipped one video...Check out when i scan past the house...At about 6 seconds in the corner are 2 objects that fly away in an unusual way...Not a plane, helicopter, or weather balloon....Crazy, i didn't notice them until i watched the video. maryland heights, mo around 4pm central time, looking east.
content.summary: Not a plane, helicopter, or weather balloon....Crazy, i didn't notice them until i watched the video.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to work this morning, and those bright, neon-green like objects were rapidly going by, moving horizontally at a spastic speed, but lasted only seconds....They seemed to just disintegrate in the air!!!

they seemed to be "twinkling" like stars, and were going really fast.....

what caught my eye was the pretty colors...

at first, i thought it was some aircraft, but nothing like that was arouns was flying around....


just gave me a feeling like "wow, what did i just witness?"

never saw anything like that in all of my 60 years!!

people say it was just a reflection from the sun rising, or a reflection off of my windshield, etc...But the sun was not out yet.  it was still cloudy, except where some of the sky was really clear, and that is where i saw those lights!!!!!!!!!  pretty wild.......

unfortunately, i did not have anything to take pictures with..That's the first thing i said to myself--"wish i had a camera!"
content.summary: Bright green, twinkling-like stars, rapid and moving horizontally

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my house observing the sky in a southeastern direction. directly above my head was what looked like an old time flash bulb. a bright cirle with a dark center. this event lasted for a few seconds. after this flash i could see no object in the area where this event took place. i continued to watch the general vicinity and the event occured again in what i could describe as higher up or deeper into space. the events were exactly the same, a bright flashbulb like burst lasting about two seconds and no observable object in the place of this flash afterwards. after waiting about ten minutes i walked out away from the house into the street at that moment an object at about eleven o'clock in the sky blinked like a strobe on an aircraft however it was way out there and no color was eminating from it. this object moved or should i say "jumped" to a position southeast of me and was blinking and moving although i could'nt see the movement. it was changing it's position without any observable movement. the pattern of it's blinking was not steady. it seemed random. i watched it "jump" away and lost it on the southern horizon. as a sidenote: my neighbor saw an object streak across the sky way up there moving from west to northeast. he said it came to a complete stop and went straight up and disappeared. this event occured about a week before my event. the whole event really had me "creeped out" i could'nt help feeling like i was being watched somehow. it was hard to sleep that night.
content.summary: Flashbulb and erratic movement of star-like object

content.detailedDescription:
We saw a large bright light and stopped our vehicle as the light seemed to be low to ground, hovering above a home. when we stopped, the light moved rapidly back and forth and went straight above (large distance) the home. we had a camera and began attempting to take pictures. when taking pictures, we noticed the object to come closer to us. there was a large triangular shape silhouetted in the moon light, at least 3 lights surrounding the object. the object seemed far away, then zooming quickly to a distance half of initial proximity.

the object then moved quickly off to the side and out of sight. we drove less than an eighth of a mile and saw another triangular shaped, lit object; again flying/hovering lower to the ground. 

we stopped the car again and began video taping the event. at that time, both triangular shaped objects came into view and began zig-zagging across the sky above and around the car. this went on for approximately 10 minutes. the lights disappeared. we drove for another 2-3 minutes and came upon the shapes again. video and pictures were taken, in many of the pictures, nothing showed up though was quite visible in the full moon light/reflective snow. the pictures that did develop were of orb-like, yellow/red/white lights that were similar to arcing electricity. we followed the lights for approximately 5 miles and the lights disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw a large bright light and stopped our vehicle as the light seemed to be low to ground

content.detailedDescription: *(name deleted--cms/sg) 16 yeares of age was walking with a friend when all of a sudden they looked up and they saw a cigar shapped ship moving strangly fast it had lights flashing off and on, **(name deleted--cms/sg) had never even thought about ufo's he was affraid as was his friend.  i myself saw a round ship many years ago, it was over a tree on my street, it had many lights flashing red, green, blue and looked like white. people made fun of me but one thing i can say is that i know what i saw, the strange thing i will always remember is how when the round ship turned to it's side i could not see a thing at all when all of a sudden it turned around i could see it again, at that point it took off so fast i had never seen anything like it or since.  i have had strange dreams over the many years where i was told that i was pregnant, and less than three months later i was introduced to a child, this happened many times.  i believe that i have been abducted at least thre times, one time a needle was put inti my navel it was painful, another time one was put into my temple, and another time i don't rembember or don't want to remember what was done.  i remember when i was around 16 yrs of age, something must have been placed in my right ankle, and i remember that whenever i would brush against it electrical shock would go up my leg, i could feel it and i knew it was there but i did not know what it was. **(name deleted--cms/sg)  incident happened in the spring of 2010 ***(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) do you believe perhaps that we as a species where brought here from another planet maybe for punishment to farm the earth?  and that perhaps the first group knew that they were brought here and they wanted to go back home and that is why they were trying to build the tower, which became the tower of babal. ***(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: My grandson and his girlfriend were walking when they looked up and saw a cigar shapped ship moving fast

content.detailedDescription: Okay here goes....It was just getting dark and went in my back yard b/c i took my dogs out.I noticed 2 chinook helicopters with their lights on(1 in front of the other but diagonally),it didn't even phase me b/c they always fly over my house,i guess my house is in their flight path...Well anyway i started to go in the house when i noticed something strange...It was bash or white,something dark or brown was on the middle of the craft,maybe an ensigna or a dark window but something,it was square,no mistake it was light enough for me to see that...It made no noise,just the chinooks did,the square object skipped through the air..Well this is what it did....Stop,go,stop,go,stop,go...But really fast but slow enough that you could tell it was a stop,go movement....I usually bring my camera outside to film things but not this time,so i yelled for the camera b/c i didn't want to miss anything but my g/f brought it out too late....Now this is what i saw...When it passed over my house it went in the direction of the sun going down so i kind of watched it get just outside of tucson and it went to the west and the chinooks went to the northwest towards ryan airfield...Oh i forget..It didn't have any lights on it,nothing was lit up
content.summary: Strange bash/white square object that skipped through the sky followed by 2 chinook helicopters

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on our back porch after dinner. i heard or felt a low rumble/hum. i caught movement out of the corner of my eye in the sky. that movment is what really brought the object into my attention and then veiw. what i saw is like nothing i have ever seen before. i have watched ufo videos of bouncing lights and disc's. this was not something out of a bad syfy movie or some grainy home made movie. this was real. 

it was flying low in the sky but moving fast. not like 1000's of mph fast but more like 200-300mph. it was also huge, it must have been 60-80 feet wide or more. as a visual que it went right between the treeline and my home. it did not glow, flash or even radiate light. how do i explain this???

it seemed like 6-8 dim stars moving through the night sky(bigger/brighter in the center and then smaller or fading out towards the ends), in a shape like the stealth bommer(b-2). not the f117 but the big one. a very soft angled triangle shape. the starlike lights almost seemed to bend the light around the craft. the light was faint almost ghost like.  also when i was looking at the ???? whatever it was. the back half of the structure beyond the lights, it was like looking at a rippling water triangled shape in the sky. honestly this really almost looked like it was a stealth bommer cloaked, but it made almost no noise. just a light rumble if that.

i have seen all the small jets, large comm airlines and milatary jets fly over and they make quite a bit of noise but this was not like those. even when they are flying high in the sky they make it known that they are flying over once they have pasted you.

i don't know what it is but i do believe that it did not think it would be seen. 

the object kept a striaght and level flight path. no bouncing or turning. it just kept moving steady in a north north west direction keeping parelle with the mountains and on the outside of the city. it just kept moving until it vanished from sight.

i was shocked when i spotted this. at first i was like no way it's got to be my eyes. then i had to look harder and then i could see this thing in the sky. after it was gone. i went in side to tell my wife but she was asleep and did'nt want to get up to talk about this. she told me to draw it out and then turned over to fall asleep again. i am not artist but i tried. then i told my teenage daughter that i saw something. she thought i was joking but then she realized i wasn't when i told her to get off the computer so i could report this.

i feel emotionally confuzed, amazed and fearful right now. i am still trying to process this right now. i know i saw this but it does not match anything i have ever seen before. this is something that i have not seen reported on before. i know this is simalar to the arizona lights or where ever that happend, this was not a bright set twinkling lights. there was no color to it. it was like the starlight was reflecting off the frontedge of this craft.
content.summary: 6-8 starlike shapes moving at highspeed

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home down my street at about 7:30 pm tonight. the object was towards the horizon in front of me when it came into my view from the right to the left from my perspective. it was above the tree line about 10 houses down the road. it was flashing white with what looked like three lights. it moved at a speed that could have been a plane or helicopter but it was strangely bright. the first thing i thought when i saw it was that it was kinda weird. i tried to keep following it but it was difficult because of trees blocking my view.
content.summary: 3 white lights flashing like lightning on and off over the tree line near my house.

content.detailedDescription:
Thought i would resubmit this sighting because it sounds like the romeo sighting report you have posted in 1988. i would be interested in finding out from those whitnesses if my sketches looked similar to the craft they saw. if you can contact them and ask i would appreciate it.  there have been so many instances of really great close up sightings in the michigan thumb area. it really is an intrest of mine. i believe *(name deleted--cms/sg) was involved in quite a few of them.
i did report this about several years ago to *(name deleted--cms/sg), i'm not sure why i waited so long but for some reason it really started to occupy my thoughts. we had several emails about it and he seemed very interested, he eventually referred me to someone from the michigan mutual ufo network, he emailed me a few times and that was it. to tell you the truth i just felt better telling someone that had an interest in it, but i'm not sure if the guy either believed me, or just wasn't interested. i will give you a brief summery, to me this was the most unusual event in my life and i still think about it daily. 

it was the fall of 1990, i was in my home in almont, mi. that time of year it gets dark quite early, it must of been around 8:00 p.M., "the times are now just an approximation". my son, who at the time was around 12 came running in the house saying there was a ufo right outside our house. let me add at this point i was not one that believed in ufos. i went outside and my son pointed south and upwards and said look! the funny thing was at first i didn't see anything, but i did notice it was unusually dark, then i noticed a very dim light, i suddenly realized that the reason it was so dark was that there was a huge craft right over our driveway. it was at tree top level and was moving north at a very slow pace, "approximately a slow walking speed". there was a very distinct humming, exactly like a large transformers hums,but you could feel the sound the resonance was so low. there was a very dull light in the middle and as it traveled down or driveway i made out a row of windows around the craft, the windows looked very large. i remember walking down the driveway with my son, then the next thing i remember is standing out in the field north of my house still looking at the ufo, when suddenly it went from approximately 90 or 100 ft straight up in the sky to where it was a pinpoint of light. it just looked like another star. this happened in under a second. we continued to watch it for quite awhile when it took off in a northwesterly direction like a meteor and was gone in a second. there are allot of things i can describe if your interested, but this is the basic part.
i don't feel like i was abducted, but i honestly do not remember how i got from my driveway and then in the field. i ask my son about it and he remembers things the way i do, but what i find unusual is that 1. i didn't really focus on it that much after the initial day it happened until a few years ago. 2. my son doesn't seem as interested as i am, even though he is a very intelligent guy. i was a flight simulator instructor in the air force and i have allot of knowledge regarding aircraft. this will always go down as the most bizarre day in my life. by the way, it seemed like i was being watched by someone in the window, but it was like you could only make out a shadow. i am now fascinated by ufo's and i know that there out there. please, if you have any more questions feel free to ask. almont is about 20 se of brown city. i have never seen another unusual craft. this was defiantly a ufo, there is no other explanation for it, i am the type of guy that checks his facts, there is nothing on our planet that i am aware of that could do what i saw! the pilots would be dead just from the g forces. it surprises me that there have been so many incidences in that area and i never heard about it. from my house to the field was approximately 1000 feet, " you would think that with what was going on, i would remember that sort of distance". i am not really concerned weather anyone believes me or not, unless it is someone that is suppose to investigate this sort of thing. they really need to have an open mind and check the facts. the last few years i have gotten increasingly interested in this subject and there have only been a few incidences that i have read about where people have been as close as i was. i guess i am just intrigued. it really fascinates me!
i was so close, 90 ft. the funny thing about it was i didn't feel threatened, in a weird way i felt like it was something from our future, as bizarre as that sounds. i feel that we need to have confidence in our instincts, i felt like i was on display and really being watched. one thing i didn't mention and to this day i am not sure why i didn't act, is that i am a professional photographer. what a dummy! the shot of a life time and i didn't even think about it. this is another thing i cant explain, i take my cameras everywhere with me. the first ten years, i would occasionally ask my son if he remembered everything about that night and he would say yes, but not really want to talk about it. it seemed like more of a dream. why? neither my son or i am the type of person not to act on something so significant, an event of a life time. another factor about that night was the route the craft was traveling, right down my driveway. my power lines go right down the drive and sometime that winter i had to call edison out, they told me that the wires were completely bare" no insulation at all", and had to replace them, including the transformer. i am not sure if it relates, but i have read stories about these craft using power lines.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Almont/romeo michigan,  huge craft right over our driveway - humming sound

content.detailedDescription: This cigar shaped [i would say as big jet fusealoge] came just south of our home at a very low level[less than a 1000 feet] and at a distance at the closet spot of less than a 1/8 mile.It was silver,no windows,no noise in a north east direction and it flew in a straight line we were very excited when we saw it and we couldn't believe our eyes after it went by and discussed it for a long while afterwards. it didn't seem to be going at a exburant rate of speed as i have been very close to fighter jets and i know what they can do. my wife seen it first while getting clothes off of the line in back yard and hollered at me while i was in the shop working on something and when i saw it i rushed over to my son's home [which is 200 ft past the shop]and hollered at them to come and look and my daughter-in-law,granddaughter,and grandson also saw it.My granddaughter run in to get a camera but it was to far away to really get a picture by then. in this area there have been a lot of strange things one night behind our house in the woods there was a bright lite shining down into the woods with no noise moving real slow and just disappeared as well as several other strange things i have seen in my life as we live near the piedmont,mo area that was the ufo hotspot of the seventys's.I have been told stories by my family back two generations of there experencies with ufo's and i don't think they would lie about it as they keep it to there selves for years before they would even talk about it. if you are interested in knowing any of there sighting i would gladly tell you. what i have told is as truthful as i can.
content.summary: Cigar shaped as large a passenger jet

content.detailedDescription: i was taking pictures of an amazing 360 degree sunset & some chemtrails when i noticed a very bright white object by them. i`m right on the west coast of fl and was looking north east. at that time i took one pick that didnt turn out before it disappeared ... then i looked south east & seen 3 identical objects to the first one, hovering above the direction of tampa international airport, higher than any planes i`ve seen approach it or flying near it. two disappeared while one hovered for maybe 20 seconds before disappearing, at that point i was able to get 3 pretty good pictures, one has a bird in, the other two are pretty startling zoom shots, to me anyway. clearly not a plane or weather balloon !! i labeled the download chemtrails but these are not chemtrails you`ll be viewing. i`m not sure how or what format you`ll be using. i`v only ever exchanged photos on twitter. but when you tweet pics on twitter there is a full view image option on the top right, please check that out if you have it. i`m sure your aware of it tho. the photos are still on my video camera & will keep them there for anyone to examine if they want.
content.summary: 4 square like very bright white objects.

content.detailedDescription: Cylinder with fuselage with produtrusions on either side resembling wings.  it made a loud noise as if a spinning turbine was jetting air through it to propel the craft forward.  this took place near forbes field airport.
content.summary: Cylinder with fuselage with produtrusions on either side resembling wings.
